intent_atoms.description: The ParsePipeline.live() streaming parse pipeline must emit ordered willStartBox/didFinishBox events with accurate offsets for all MP4 boxes.
Unit tests cover nested container traversal, large-size boxes, and error propagation to validate the live pipeline behavior.

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline.live() streaming parse pipeline
functional_units.description: Provides a live streaming parse pipeline that traverses nested MP4 boxes using an explicit stack and emits ordered willStartBox/didFinishBox events with accurate offsets.
